articles.title: Canada wants the U.S. to negotiate for its hostages - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Canada wants to get Michael Spavor and Michael Kovrig home. With Meng Wanzhou arrested in Vancouver at the request of the U.S., the Americans are the ones who can bargain
articles.content:
Dominic Barton, Canada's ambassador to China, stands near a barricade tape at a detention centre to meet Canadian Michael Spavor, in Dandong, China, on Aug. 11.

articles.title: Stillwater: Matt Damon goes full MAGA in drama that might just get him an Oscar - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: REVIEW: Hollywood hasn't had much time or empathy for the illiberal, white American male recently, but this might help to balance the ledger a little.
articles.content:
